participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: empathetic and nurturing, enjoys sharing life experiences and hobbies.
participant_1.background: i'm retired and living the great life. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and strategic, enjoys intellectual conversations and has a playful side.
participant_2.background: i love taking bubble baths. i am single and with two dogs. i do not drink alcohol. i like to play chess.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i've three dogs.
i like to watch the olympics.
i'm in an open polyamorous relationship.
i also have a dog walking business.
my father was a door to door salesman.
